      • initSDK

        public static void initSDK(Context context,
           java.lang.String SDKAppKey,
           boolean enableStatistics)
        expansion options of initSDK(Context), call this method to switching using statistics or not
        Parameters:
        enableStatistics - determin wether to send shared content to ShareSDK server or not, default is true, means turn on

      • stopSDK

        public static void stopSDK(Context context)
        Deprecated. 
        call this method before you app close

        Deprecated method

      • stopSDK

        public static void stopSDK()
        Deprecated. 
        call this method before you app close

        Deprecated method

      • registerService

        public static void registerService(java.lang.Class<? extends Service> service)
        register ShareSDK service.

        call unregisterService(Class) to unregister the service.
        every service only registers one time before it's unregister
        this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

      • unregisterService

        public static void unregisterService(java.lang.Class<? extends Service> service)
        unregister ShareSDK service

        you don't have to call this method to unregister the service, after you calling stopSDK(), all service will be unregistered
        this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

      • getService

        public static <T extends Service> T getService(java.lang.Class<T> name)
        get a registered service instance by its name

      • registerPlatform

        public static void registerPlatform(java.lang.Class<? extends CustomPlatform> platform)
        register the custom platform.

        call unregisterPlatform(Class) to unregister the platform.
        every platform only registers one time before it's unregister
        this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

      • unregisterPlatform

        public static void unregisterPlatform(java.lang.Class<? extends CustomPlatform> platform)
        unregister the custom platform

        you don't have to call this method to unregister the platform, after you calling stopSDK(), all platforms will be unregistered
        this method must be called between initSDK(Context) and stopSDK()

        public static void removeCookieOnAuthorize(boolean remove)
        determine whether remove cookie before web authorizing or not.

        default value is false: don't remove
